name: Tales of Sector 1
description:
Listen up recruit!

We've recently caught wind of a nasty spreading virus infecting the lower sectors. It's your job to sort out that town so we don't lose our most valuable asset.

Don't forget your moral training though. We don't want a repeat of the Pirate Cove incident. These denizens are easily swayed by the likes of new faces.

Jame Gam #19

This was a game made in 6 days with the love of three indie game developers:

  • Neonalig (Programmer, that's me :) )
  • HonkinDonkin (2D Artist)
  • Twitchywhalez (Composer)

Credits / Used Assets

Models

  • Station Demerzel by ra_fuq (Sketchfab)
  • Low polygon Chair by vanhallsingh (Sketchfab)
  • Low poly basic cash register by m31odyr (Sketchfab)
  • Interogation Room by denis_cliofas (Sketchfab)
  • Metal Ladder by Francesco Coldesina (Sketchfab)
  • Game Ready Sci-Fi Crate Pile by jQueary (Sketchfab)
  • Scientific Lab by Hariharan (Sketchfab)
  • FREE Casual Food Pack- Mobile/VR by Lumo-Art 3D (Unity Asset Store)
  • Futuristic Desk by Luke Miller (Sketchfab)

VFX

  • Cartoon FX Free by Jean Moreno (Unity Asset Store)

Audio

  • Garage Door Opening by ANARKYA (Freesound)
  • Garage Door Closed by ANARKYA (Freesound)

Textures

  • Aerial Photo of City by lexi lauwers (Pexels)
